Articles.Content:
As far as I can tell, there are no posts on this issue before. Esc doesn't pause the game for me sometimes (randomly) or display the menu. The cheat menu does display, still. The key binding is still set to esc in settings.cfg.

How can I fix this?

Mods: Airplanes Plus, KER, KAS, BD Armory
Maybe something is triggering an input lock. Go to the alt-f12 windows and "clear input locks" whenever the Esc key stops working.
